description:
Tackle your favourite hikes all winter long. A lightweight, flexible deck moves naturally under your feet, and heel riser bars give your calves a break on steep sections. Sharp toe crampons and traction rails bite into crunchy snow for confidence and grip. The Boa binding system tightens in a sinch wasting no time in the pursuit of fresh tracks in powder-filled forests.

  • FLEX Tail™ decking absorbs shock and allows for a natural gait
  • CustomWrap™ 2.0 bindings use the tried and tested BOA® Fit System
  • Heel strap also adjusts with the turn of a dial for full-foot comfort and a precise fit
  • ActiveLift™ Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
  • Toe crampons and 3D curved traction rails provide great control
name: Tubbs RDG Snowshoes - Women's
